instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 F. Cover cookie sheets with aluminum foil. Beat egg whites until foamy. Then
gradually beat in sugar until meringue forms stiff peaks. Add vanilla and salt and stir in chocolate chips and
nuts. Drop meringue by teaspoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheets. Garnish with a chocolate chip if desired.
Place in oven and turn oven off. Do not open oven for 6 hours or overnight. Makes 4 dozen.
name: Meringue Chip Cookies
